page.title: 20Credits.
page.content: The information contained in these pages was compiled by 4th. year children at Ellesmere Primary School. The pages are their view of their enviroment as they see it but much of the information has been supplied by adults in the area. Class members were: Amanda Allcock, Louise Sumnall, Joanne Jones, Debbie Vickers, Catherine Evans Tina Walker, Tracey Pierce, Emma Stav, Mandy Armstrong, Jason Nicholls, John MacKenzie, Robin Ledson, Chris Booth, Jeremy Brookes, David Roberts, Alan Hinton, Robin Poll, Craig Dixon, Simon Wilson, Stephen Edwards, Leigh Roberts Paul Bellingham, Stuart Holmes, Lee McArthur. Class teacher: John Jones.
